metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14543 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: There exists one NULL pointer dereference vulnerability inAP4_JsonInspector::AddField in Ap4Atom.cpp in Bento4 1.5.1-624, which canallow attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted mp4 file. Thisvulnerability can be triggered by the executable mp4dump.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
